nodes.documentation:
以拍卖者地址 `_Auctioneer` 的名义，
 创建一个简单的拍卖，拍卖时间为 `_biddingTime`分钟 。
退款（当该出价已被超越）
nodes.name: Refund

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "There already is a higher bid."

arguments.value: There already is a higher bid.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "There already is a higher bid."

nodes.documentation:
对拍卖进行出价，具体的出价随交易一起发送。
 如果没有在拍卖中胜出，则返还出价。
nodes.name: bid

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only Auctioneer can end this Auction!"

arguments.value: Only Auctioneer can end this Auction!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only Auctioneer can end this Auction!"

nodes.documentation: 结束拍卖，并把最高的出价发送给受益人
nodes.name: AuctionEnd
